Interface DatabaseConnector

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseDatabaseConnection
public interface DatabaseConnector
Interface for managing database connections. Provides methods to establish, retrieve, and disconnect database connections.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Connection
    connect()
    Establishes a connection to the database.
    void
    disconnect()
    Disconnects the current database connection.
    Connection
    getConnection()
    Retrieves the current database connection.

  • Method Details

    • connect

      Connection connect() throws SQLException
      Establishes a connection to the database.
      Returns:
      A Connection object representing the database connection.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while connecting to the database.

    • disconnect

      void disconnect() throws SQLException
      Disconnects the current database connection.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while disconnecting from the database.

    • getConnection

      Connection getConnection()
      Retrieves the current database connection.
      Returns:
      A Connection object representing the current database connection.
